pilots.certifications: STCW, GMDSS, BRM, Container Terminal Safety, ULCV Handling

weatherData.description: JNPT weather data - February winter/dry season, NW monsoon. Semi-diurnal tides with ~4m range.

tidalData.description: Semi-diurnal tides at JNPT, ~4m tidal range

berthMaintenance.description: Routine bollard and fender inspection - NSFT Berth 3
GTI Berth 2 - STS Crane 5 hoist motor replacement
Liquid Cargo Jetty 1 - Pipeline and valve inspection
NSICT Berth 2 - Quay wall structural inspection
BMCT Berth 6 - STS Crane rail alignment and greasing
Shallow Water Berth - Dredging and depth survey
Liquid Cargo Jetty 2 - Cathodic protection system replacement

ukcData.vesselDescription: MSC Ivana (mega vessel, 16.35m draft) entering BMCT via Deep Water Channel
ukcData.recommendation: Safe to transit. Adequate UKC with current tide. Proceed via BMCT Deep Water Approach.

ukcData.vesselDescription: MSC Ivana - what-if at low tide (risk scenario)
ukcData.recommendation: UNSAFE: Insufficient UKC at low tide. Delay transit until tide reaches 2.5m minimum.
Safe to transit. Good UKC margin. Normal approach via BMCT channel.

ukcData.vesselDescription: CMA CGM Mumbai (15.5m draft) entering BMCT
ukcData.recommendation: Safe to transit. Comfortable UKC margins at current tide.

ukcData.vesselDescription: Berlin Express (14.5m draft) entering via Inner Harbour to NSIGT
ukcData.recommendation: Safe to transit. Excellent UKC. Can proceed at any tidal state.

ukcData.vesselDescription: Maersk Salalah (14.5m draft) in Inner Harbour Channel
ukcData.recommendation: Safe but monitor tide. Adequate UKC with current high tide. Avoid transit at low tide.

ukcData.vesselDescription: Indian Progress (Bulk, 12.5m draft) entering Shallow Water Channel
ukcData.recommendation: WARNING: Marginal UKC in Shallow Water Channel. Transit only during high tide (>3.0m).
Safe to transit at any tide. Large UKC margin for feeder vessel.

ukcData.vesselDescription: Ratna Shruti (Tanker, 12.5m draft) entering Inner Harbour to LCJ
ukcData.recommendation: Safe to transit. Higher UKC requirement for tanker met. Proceed to Liquid Cargo Jetty.
Safe to transit. Good UKC margins for chemical tanker. Standard escort protocols.
